full_summary:
Government of Canada
Architectural and Engineering Services for New Police Facility in Estevan, Saskatchewan
 Solicitation # M5000-23-1911/A Amendment # 12

**Notice Details:**
* Publication Date: August 16, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 17, 2023 2:00 p.m. Central Standard Time
* Amendment Date: October 17, 2023

**Project Requirements:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the services of an Architectural firm to act as Prime Consultant for the design and construction administration of a new police detachment facility and storage garage in Estevan, Saskatchewan. The firm will provide a comprehensive consulting team with expertise in civil, structural, mechanical, electrical, landscape architecture, scheduling, and commissioning.

**Project Objectives:**
* Design and administer the construction of a new modular police detachment facility and storage garage to meet RCMP program requirements.
* Deliver and set up the new facility on a building site secured by the RCMP.

**Contract Period:**
* Four (4) years from the date of contract award.
* The contract may be extended by the Canadian Government at its option, with multiple option periods, to align with the completion of the corresponding construction contract.

**Important Notes:**

* A security requirement is associated with this requirement.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Indiaan procurement: The federal Indigenous Business Directory is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity.
* All documents and information related to this solicitation are available on Canada Buy at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/federal-businesses/professional-engineering-services#architectural

**Procurement Information:**

* Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
